_description: Gospel for Wednesday after Passion Sunday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: It bifell in þe winter tideþat al þe iews with mekill pride…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þir wordes thoght þe iews ful hardAls men may here efter ward
BLHar4196.Note: receded by Latin, “Facta sunt encennia in ierosolimis.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii proxima secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 63vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.149-152.
